dmca.title: Laser Eye Surgery sites in staring contest
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs

Notice of infringement

I am writing to file a notice of infringement by http://lasereyesurgeryclinics.blogspot.com " on the contents of my website at http://www.lasereyesurgeryfacts.com/   the front page of the website is here, the rest of the pages of the website are currently in my blog domain : http://www.blogstudio.com/woodgnome/laser.html until I move them.

Sender Information:
Sent by: Paul Flanagan
Email: [private]@ic24.net

1. My works that I believe have been infringed upon are detailed below:

(A) His post dated Sunday 17th July 2005 at: http://lasereyesurgeryclinics.blogspot.com/2005/07/lasix lasek lasik wavefront or.html

Contains all the main body of text from my page here:

http://www.blogstudio.com/woodgnome/laser.html

(B) His post, (entitled "Lasik Lasix Eye Surgery Diary Journal From a fellow Blogger"), dated Sunday 17th July 2005 at: fttp://lasereyesurgeryclinics.blogspot.com/2005/07/lasik lasix eye surgery diary-joumal.html

Contains all the main body text from the following two pages:

http://www.blogstudio.com/woodgnome/laserdiary.html 
http://www.blogstudio.com/woodgnome/laserdiary1.html
 
Sent by:	10/09/2005 16:48:18 	Page 2 of 2

(C) His post dated Sunday 17"' July 2005 at: http://lasereyesurgeryclinics.blogspot.com/2005/07/american usa lasik lasix lasereye.html

Contains all the main body of the bulk of the text from the following two pages:
http://www.blogstudio.com/woodgnome/laserusa.html 
http://www.blogstudio.com/woodgnome/laserusal.html

(D) His post dated Sunday 17th July 2005 at: http://lasereyesurgeryclinics.blogspot.com/2005/07/australian lasix lasik laser eye.html

Contains all the main body of text from my page here:
http://www.blogstudio.com/woodgnome/laserau.html

(E) His post dated Sunday 17th July 2005 at: fttp://lasereyesurgeryclinics.blogspot.com/2005/07/canadian lasik lasix laser eyesurgery.html

Contains all the main body of text from my page here:
fttpt://www.blogstudio.com/woodgnome/laserea.html

(F) His post dated Sunday 17th July 2005 at: http://lasereyesurgeryclinics.blogspot.com/2005/07/canadian lasik lasix laser eyesurgery.html

Contains all the main body of text from the following two pages:
http://www.blogstudio.com/woodgnome/laseruk.html 
http://www.blogstudio.com/woodgnome/laserukl.html

2. The materials have been taken on a copy and paste basis, in whole or in part. 

3. I can be contacted at mailto: [private]@ic24.net 

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorised by the copyright owner, its agent, me, or the law. 

5. I swear under penalty of perjury that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is.

Yours faithfully,

[signature]

Paul Flanagan
